name: Others Will Help
description:
Nowadays it is important to change our viewpoint a bitb because we have to care more about each other and put aside ME and focus more on US.

This game tests how you behave in such a situation where you have to make quick decisions. There's lifes depending on what Can you do and what Would you do for others.

Please stay true to yourself when you play this game!

We have nothing more to add, let the game speak for itself.
